T02D1493:207a-1: ae ka b'i ra s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D1493:207a-3: dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D1493:207a-4: dpal lhan cig skyes ba rang gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1493:207a-5: dang por sngags pas phyi nang gi dri ma dag par byas la stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
T02D1493:207a-6: rang skad cig gis he ru kar bskyad ba'i snying
T02D1493:207a-7: ga'i h'um gi 'od kyis gdug pa can thams cad
T02D1493:207a-9: 'od tshur 'dus pa las srung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1493:207a-10: de nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1493:207a-11: sems can thams cad bde ba dang ldan par bya snyam pa'i byams pa dang /
T02D1493:207a-12: sdug bsngal dang bral bar bya snyam pa'i snying rje dang /
T02D1493:207a-13: he ru ka'i go 'phang la dgod par 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang /
T02D1493:207a-14: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i
T02D1493:207a-15: rtsa ba ma lus pa la dgod par 'dod pa'i
T02D1493:207a-16: btang snyoms tshad med pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1493:207a-17: de nas dad pa dang gus pas mdun gyi nam
T02D1493:207a-18: mkha' la bla ma brgyud pa dang bcas pa dang
T02D1493:207a-19: / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsams te /
T02D1493:207a-20: de dag thams cad 'od kyi gong bu las /
T02D1493:207a-21: dpal he ru kar gyur pa la mchod pa dang /
T02D1493:207a-25: gsol ba gdab pa la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1493:207a-26: de nas aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bha wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1493:207b-0: zhes brjod @207b pas stong pa nyid du bsam par bya'o //
T02D1493:207b-1: 'byung ba rim brtsegs ri rab kyi steng du padma
T02D1493:207b-2: la nyi ma dang zla ba'i steng du h'um 'od
T02D1493:207b-3: zer lnga 'phro ba dang 'du ba rdo rje sems
T02D1493:207b-5: de yongs su gyur pa las bcom ldan 'das dpa'
T02D1493:207b-6: bo gcig pa sku mdog mthing ga zhal gcig phyag
T02D1493:207b-7: gnyis pa rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pas yum
T02D1493:207b-8: la 'khyud pa / zhabs g-yas brkyang bas 'jigs byed mnan pa /
T02D1493:207b-9: g-yon bskum pas dus mtshan ma mnan pa ral pa nag po gyen du g-yengs pa'i cod pan can /
T02D1493:207b-10: spyi gtsug gi nor bu dang /
T02D1493:207b-11: sna tshogs rdo rje dang zla ba phyed pa'i dbu rgyan can /
T02D1493:207b-12: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa dar dpyangs kyi cod pan can /
T02D1493:207b-13: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan zhing shin tu 'gying bag dang ldan pa /
T02D1493:207b-14: stag gi pags pas smad dkris shing /
T02D1493:207b-15: mi mgo lnga bcus do shal byas pa /
T02D1493:207b-16: phyag rgya drug dang ldan par bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1493:207b-17: de'i spyan sngar yum bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje
T02D1493:207b-18: bag mo sku mdog dmar mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis
T02D1493:207b-19: ma spyan gsum pa phyag g-yon na thod pa bsnams
T02D1493:207b-21: g-yas rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub byas nas gdug pa can skrag par byed pa /
T02D1493:207b-22: skra grol ba gcer bu dum bus skye rags can /
T02D1493:207b-23: mi mgo skam po'i phreng bas se ral khar 'phyang ba /
T02D1493:207b-24: zhabs g-yas byin pa la 'khril zhing g-yon brkyang ba /
T02D1493:207b-25: phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid can /
T02D1493:207b-26: yab yum snang stong zung du 'jug pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1493:207b-27: de las lus skyo zhing sems dub na bskyed rim
T02D1493:207b-28: gyi ngang las bla ma'i man ngag gis bzlas par
T02D1493:207b-29: bya'o ; / de yang he ru ka'i thugs ka
T02D1493:207b-30: nas ye shes sems dpa' de'i thugs ka nas ting
T02D1493:207b-31: nge 'dzin sems dpa'i yi ge h'um sngon po la
T02D1493:207b-32: snying po'i sngags kyis bskor ba la sems gtad de
T02D1493:207b-33: bya'o ; bzlas pa bya'o // aom hr'i: ha ha h'um h'um phat /
T02D1493:207b-34: de las skyo bar gyur na khams gsum thams cad 'od kyi rang bzhin du byas te /
T02D1493:207b-35: 'od zer yang rim gyis bsdus nas /
T02D1493:207b-36: he ru ka yab yum la /
T02D1493:207b-38: h'um zhabs gyu nas n'a da'i bar du bsdus la /
T02D1493:207b-39: 'od gsal bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngang la ji srid gnas kyi bar du bsgom mo //
T02D1493:207b-40: de las kyang lus skyo sems dub na /
T02D1493:208a-2: snang la rang bzhin med pa me long gi gzugs
T02D1493:208a-3: brnyan lta bu kha dog dang bcas pa 'ja' tshon
T02D1493:208a-4: lta bu / sgro skur dang bral ba chu zla
T02D1493:208a-5: lta bur langs te zung 'jug tu bsgom par bya'o
T02D1493:208a-6: lta bu / // spyod lam dang thun mtshams kyi
T02D1493:208a-7: rnal 'byor dang ldan pas thun bzhir nyams su blang
T02D1493:208a-8: lta bu / // ngo // dpal bde mchog 'khor
T02D1493:208a-9: lo dpa' bo gcig pa'i sgrub thabs yul bham ga
T02D1493:208a-10: la'i slob dpon bsod snyoms pa dpal mar me mdzad
T02D1493:208a-11: ye shes kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
